sentences.sContent: When you and your maybe-likely-soon-to-be ex cease to be an item and revert to singlehood, when should you revise your online relationship status?
sentences.sContent_eng: When you and your maybe-likely-soon-to-be ex cease to be an item and revert to singlehood, when should you revise your online relationship status?
sentences.sCn: 或许分手已经在即，而当你们要对整个恋爱事件喊停，不要再当彼此的附庸物品并重新回归单身岁月时，你该何时再来修改网上的个人感情状态？

sentences.sContent: If such people see singlehood on the horizon, they make doubly sure there is somebody else on deck.
sentences.sContent_eng: If such people see singlehood on the horizon, they make doubly sure there is somebody else on deck.
sentences.sCn: 所以像这样的人一旦发觉自己将面临单身，他们一定会加倍确保有别的人能补上这个空缺。

sentences.sContent: Whatever the reasons for the singlehood of the guy is, be it the death of his wife or divorce with his wife, it is better to start life once again as nothing is the end of anything.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whatever the reasons for the singlehood of the guy is, be it the death of his wife or divorce with his wife, it is better to start life once again as nothing is the end of anything.
sentences.sCn: 妻子过世了也好，离婚了也罢，不管这个男人为什么单身，最好是重新开始一段生活，因为没有什么事能够让一切都结束。
